Let's Start

Why Site Has Been Build?

I wanted to train Sass and modular Vanila JavaScript. Also, i wanted to try use bundlers like Webpack with loaders to learn the setup of bigger projects. Application are based on Recipe API from EDAMAM. Of course, i saw that clickbite titles on youtube with same ideas of project. I Understand that i dont do something original, but i'm trying to do it by myself. If i complete my app, then i watch one of this tutorials looking for good practices or some new tricks.

Provided Functionality:

  • Searching recipes
  • Displaying ingredients
  • Displaying instructions
  • Displaying macros
